metadata.description: The SKAR virus has infected a handful of adolescents worldwide, giving them superhuman, telekinetic powers along with a death sentence. When the government and the private sector both set out to find a cure for the deadly illness, their humanitarian effort could set up a whole new balance of power. Enter young Sam Chase, who finds himself SKAR+. The imminent end of his life just might be the beginning of an entirely different world.
metadata.name: Poison Candy
